title: Bank of America Quarterly Profit Rises 58% on Higher Interest Income
sub_head: Profit also boosted by release of cash that bank had set aside to cover loan losses
body:
Bank of America Corp. third-quarter profit rose 58%, suggesting banksâ€™ lending businesses are starting to improve from a pandemic slump.
The second-largest U.S. bank earned $7.69 billion, up from $4.88 billion a year earlier. Per-share earnings of 85 cents topped the 71 cents that analysts polled by FactSet had expected.
